title: 601. Differences of Being a Left-Handed QB + Reaction to Tua Named as Dolphins' Starting QB
itunes:title: 601. Differences of Being a Left-Handed QB + Reaction to Tua Named as Dolphins' Starting QB
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys react to the news of Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa being named the starter (1:23). Next, former NFL QB Boomer Esiason joins as he discusses the differences of being a left-handed and right-handed QB and he also gives his take on Tua (4:15). Then, former Bengals WR Cris Collinsworth talks to DJ and Bucky about what it's like catching a ball from a left-handed QB, as he did from Boomer Esiason (6:16). After, former NFL QB Mark Brunell gives insight about his experience as a left-handed QB (10:37). Following that, former NFL coach Steve Mariucci speaks on what he noticed from coaching a left-handed QB vs. a right-handed QB (14:41). To wrap up the show, former NFL QB Michael Vick touches on being a left-handed QB and explains why he believes in Tua (19:47).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
